title: New IE is a disgrace
body: Double ur crit chance and 20% true damage. Is the balance team actually retarded

replies.body: I'd rather that then 50% more crit damage. Now ADCs will actually be punished in a way for building IE, double Zeal, so they'll either waste money on a stat or look for a different AS item, losing out on MS.

but the new IE Is a huge nerf for crit adcs. 

1. it costs more
2. It no longer gives crit on its own (meaning no more rushing)
3. It doesnt give crits the huge burst they had
4. punishes adcs who want to reachh 100% crit since they will have to go overboard for 2 extra crit items.
To be fair it's a buff to Ashe who wants 100% crit for the slow. So I'm happy.

>
> To be fair it's a buff to Ashe who wants 100% crit for the slow. So I'm happy.

Me too

It also no longer gives crit/crit damage.

Do the math before crying.

Old IE + PD = 1+0.5*(2.5-1) = 1.75 base damage

New IE + PD = 1+0.6*(2-1) = 1.6 base damage, plus the true damage passive.

IE is weaker against squishies, weaker with only two items, and utterly useless as a first item.
